# SampleConfs - World & Areas

Config files related to world map, areas, dungeons, terrain, and environment.

## Dungeons - Core
- **DungeonBase.json** - Base dungeon definitions
- **DungeonRoomBase.json** - Dungeon room templates
- **DungeonScaleBase.json** - Dungeon scaling
- **DungeonSceneBase.json** - Scene definitions
- **DungeonSceneObject.json** - Scene objects
- **DungeonTrigger.json** - Dungeon triggers
- **DungeonUnitBase.json** - Dungeon units

## Dungeon Effects
- **DungeonEffect1001.json**
- **DungeonEffect1002.json**
- **DungeonEffectBase.json** - Base effect system
- **DungeonEnemyDesc.json** - Enemy descriptions
- **DungeonPowerDesc.json** - Power descriptions

## Special Dungeons
- **DungeonSpecial47.json** through **DungeonSpecial91.json** (20+ files)
- **DungonSpecial74sub.json**

## Special Dungeon Rooms
- **DungeonSpecialRoom1.json**
- **DungeonSpecialRoom30.json**
- **DungeonSpecialRoom31.json**
- **DungeonSpecialRoom77Parameters.json**
- **DungeonSpecialRoomBase.json**
- **DungeonSpecialRoomTrigger.json**

## Map & Navigation
- **MapData.json** - Map data
- **MapPosition.json** - Position data
- **MoveCam.json** - Camera movement

## World Areas
- **WorldAreaSpecial.json** - Special areas
- **WorldDungeonLevel.json** - Dungeon levels

## World Blocks & Terrain
- **WorldBlockAttribute.json** - Block attributes
- **WorldBlockGeomantic.json** - Geomantic blocks
- **WorldBlockGeomanticSub.json** - Sub-geomantic blocks
- **WorldBlockGetExp.json** - Experience blocks
- **WorldBlockHerb.json** - Herb gathering blocks
- **WorldBlockMine.json** - Mining blocks
- **WorldBlockMineBook.json** - Mining knowledge
- **WorldBlockOperation.json** - Block operations

## World Buildings
- **WorldBuilding10001.json**
- **WorldBuilding10002.json**
- **WorldBuilding10005.json**
- **WorldBuilding10007.json**
- **WorldBuilding10008.json**
- **WorldBuildingBase.json** - Building templates

## World Creation
- **WorldCreateCmd.json** - Creation commands

## Fortuitous Events (Random Encounters)
- **WorldFortuitousEvent2.json**
- **WorldFortuitousEvent2Effect.json**
- **WorldFortuitousEvent3.json**
- **WorldFortuitousEvent4.json**
- **WorldFortuitousEvent5.json**
- **WorldFortuitousEvent7.json**
- **WorldFortuitousEvent7Sub.json**
- **WorldFortuitousEventBase.json** - Base event system
- **WorldFortuitousEventIcon.json** - Event icons

## Monster Areas
- **WorldMonsterArea.json** - Monster spawn areas
- **WorldMonsterAreaMatch.json** - Area matching
- **WorldMonsterAreaTrigger.json** - Area triggers
- **WorldMonsterRefresh.json** - Monster refresh rates
- **WorldMonsterSpecialArea.json** - Special spawn areas

## Villages & Settlements
- **WorldJinhuaVillage.json** - Jinhua Village
- **WorldVillage1.json**
- **WorldVillageBase.json** - Village templates

## Tasks & Objectives
- **WorldTaskSign.json** - Task markers

## Terrain & Environment
- **WorldTerr1001.json**
- **WorldTerrainDecorate.json** - Decorations
- **WorldTerrainType.json** - Terrain types

---

**Total:** 80+ files
